_meta.description: Spec-correct values extracted from the KBL Guide v2 error audit, organized by code location. Each entry maps a guide error to the correct spec value and the code file where that value lives.
_meta.usage: Ingest with a CLI to reconcile guide content against codebase constants. Each category groups corrections by the engine/module that owns the data.

corrections.note: Guide fabricated Hot/Cold/Slumping. Real names are Locked In and Tense. 5 states, not 6.
Guide called this 'Hot' with fabricated values
Guide called this 'Cold' with fabricated values

spec_correct.Rattled (-2): ~-15-20% all stat penalties, hard to escape

corrections.note: Guide fabricated per-stat breakdowns. Mojo affects all stats uniformly via statMultiplier.
30% of excess Mojo carries to next game, rounded
Every name except Juiced is wrong in guide.
Juiced affects all stats not just power, and is not temporary
Guide said +3 same as Perfect Game. Code confirms NO_HITTER=3, but guide's claim that PG also=3 is wrong.
This is a Fame BONER (negative). Guide massively understates the penalty.
NATURAL_CYCLE: 4 at line 786
Code shows -1 (boner). Guide said +1 boner. Audit said spec=1.5 but code confirms -1. Reconcile with spec doc.
Code confirms 2. Audit said spec=3. Spec doc may contradict code — flag for reconciliation.
WALK_OFF: 1, WALK_OFF_GRAND_SLAM: 3
Code confirms 1. Also NUT_SHOT_TOUGH_GUY: 1 at line 815.
Value matches. But TOOTBLAN_RALLY_KILLER: -2 at line 920 exists and guide omits it.
Code default is 100 pitches. Spec formula is Math.floor(innings × 9.44). Guide's 67 matches nothing.

categories.label: Salary System — Position Multipliers, Age Factors, Base Formula

corrections.spec_correct: soft cap with luxury tax thresholds
corrections.note: See SALARY_SYSTEM_SPEC.md for cap structure details

corrections.spec_correct: salary > team_avg × 1.5 AND negative WAR for 2+ consecutive seasons
corrections.note: Check SALARY_SYSTEM_SPEC.md for canonical definition
Guide omits D+ and D grades entirely
Guide uses a fabricated 0-99 scale. Code uses weighted rating thresholds from stat formula.
Mathematically equivalent but guide implies integer division
Quick Reference chapter shows 6 states, code has 7
Both name and range are wrong in guide
Guide fabricated 'Angry' state. Real state at this level is FRUSTRATED.
Guide fabricated all FA attraction percentages. Check FAN_MORALE_SYSTEM_SPEC.md for real modifiers.
Code war.ts has simplified categories (mini:16, short:20, standard:32, long:48). Master spec has full list. Guide's 82 and 128 don't exist anywhere.
Percentage-based, not fixed game count
Master spec says 20. Code uses unbounded array — verify if MAX_UNDO constant exists elsewhere.

corrections.spec_correct: at-bat input with specific fields (outcome, location, RBI, etc.)
lookup-table approach based on (inning, score differential, base/out state)
corrections.note: Guide fabricated a formula. LI uses pre-computed tables.

corrections.spec_correct: thresholds shift with season length via Adaptive Standards
Leverage Index × outcome value (nuanced system, not simple percentage cap)
multi-dimensional: overall, runs, homeRuns, leftHandedHR, rightHandedHR, leftHandedAVG, rightHandedAVG, confidence
corrections.code_symbol: interface ParkFactors { overall, runs, homeRuns, leftHandedHR, rightHandedHR, leftHandedAVG, rightHandedAVG, confidence }

corrections.spec_correct: per-stat-category seed values from SMB4 stadium data

corrections.note: Each team protects ONE player, not 16. Most egregious error in the guide.
Missing: League Leaders, Kara Kawaguchi Award, Bust of the Year, Comeback Player of the Year

corrections.guide_wrong: feature exists — manager distributes rating boosts
corrections.spec_correct: FABRICATED — feature does not exist. Phase 3 is automated WAR-based ratings adjustment.
trait modification (gain Butter Fingers OR lose most positive trait)

corrections.note: SMB4_DEFAULT_GAMES is used as the baseline. Scaling = gamesPerSeason / 162.

corrections.spec_correct: dual-threshold: Dynamic 10% Threshold (primary, franchise history) + Fixed Threshold Floor (secondary)
named beat reporters with specific personalities
check specs/NARRATIVE_SYSTEM_SPEC.md for canonical reporter list
specific trigger criteria and timing rules
development modifiers only, no named 'morale' system

corrections.note: Guide undercounts by 2.5x

corrections.guide_wrong: SIM games use the SAME engines as played games
corrections.spec_correct: syntheticGameFactory uses probability curves, not identical pitch-by-pitch engine

corrections.guide_wrong: specific bracket format presented as definitive

corrections.spec_correct: Full list in FameEventType union (src/types/game.ts:571-760) includes ~80+ event types

corrections.guide_wrong: a fielder's error on an easy play (per-play event)
corrections.spec_correct: annual AWARD for worst fielder (offseason ceremony)
1.5x stacks with RISP (1.3x), late innings (1.5x), bases loaded (1.4x), close game (1.2x)
defined criteria: games played, fan morale contribution, media presence
significantly more than 50 when all WAR components, fame categories, and stat lines counted
38 storage + utility modules (includes utils, not pure storage)
